attributes.action: Make Local Authority Housing Allocation Fairer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We beleive that local authority housing should give more preference to its local people and their housing needs, rather than operating fully open waiting lists to people from anywhere in the country (with no links to the area)to enable people born in a certain area, to remain in that area, and their future children, to remain part of the local history, as their past relations have been.
